blocks.text: Tucked away just minutes from downtown Moncton, Casino New Brunswick has become a cornerstone of Atlantic Canada’s nightlife and leisure since opening in 2010. Once a pioneering tourist venture, it has become one of the most active entertainment spots in the area, where visiting the casino, enjoying a fine meal, attending a music performance, and staying at a comfortable hotel all come under a single roof. It is not that simple about slot machines and blackjack tables only.

Casino NB features a 126-room luxury hotel, the Molson Canadian Centre, where concerts and events are hosted, and a thriving restaurant scene, providing a complete resort experience. Tourists can also use the evening to roll dice, watch a performance, and even spend the night without having to step out of the compound. The resort which is owned and operated by Great Canadian Entertainment covers a gaming floor of over 24,000 square feet and features over 600 slot devices as well as traditional table games.

Casino NB is still inviting travellers and locals fifteen years after the opening of this entertainment destination as it offers good ambience, professional service, and an all-year-round variety of entertaining activities whose presence keeps the nights of Moncton vibrant.

Currencies at Casino New Brunswick

All transactions at Casino New Brunswick are conducted in Canadian dollars (CAD). This applies to on-site gaming, hotel payments, dining, and any reservations made through the mobile-friendly website, ensuring a consistent and straightforward experience for all guests.
NB Casino Licence

NB Casino is licensed and regulated by the New Brunswick Lotteries and Gaming Corporation (NBLGC). All games follow the Gaming Control Act, ensuring fair play, security, and compliance with provincial laws.
